text: Markaasay markay ka quusteen isula baxeen faq gaar ah. Koodii u weynaa (Rubiin) baa wuxuu yidhi: Ma waydaan ogeyn in Aabbihiin ballan adag idiinka qaaday Magaca Ilaahay, iyo sida aad horeyba uga gabood fasheen arrinkii Yuusuf? Sidaa awgeed anigu sinnaba kama tegi doona arladan jeer aabbahay ii idmo, ama Allaah xukumo arrinkayga26, oo Isaga baa u wanaagsan inta wax Xukunta
